teacherRegistration.nameStepDescription: Your name will not be displayed publicly, and will be kept confidential and secure.
teacherRegistration.phoneStepDescription: Dit telefon nummer vil ikke bliver vist offentligt og vil bliver opbevaret fortroligt og sikkert
teacherRegistration.phoneConsent: Ja, holdet bag scratch må gerne ringe til mig for at bekræfte min undervisnings konto hvis nødvendigt.
teacherRegistration.validationPhoneConse: Du skal give samtykke for verificering af din underviser konto.
teacherRegistration.privacyDescription: Your information will not be displayed publicly, and will be kept confidential and secure.
teacherRegistration.useScratchStepDescri: Tell us a little about how you plan to use Scratch. Why do we ask for this information
teacherRegistration.howUseScratch: Hvordan vil du bruge scratch i din organisation
teacherRegistration.emailStepDescription: We will send you a confirmation email that will allow you to access your Scratch Teacher Account.
teacherRegistration.validationEmailMatch: De to emails er ikke ens
teacherRegistration.validationAge: Sorry, teachers must be at least 13 years old
